text: felt grown-up when i realized meal planning wasn’t just figuring out dinner but also balancing nutrients & budget at once – hello real-world skills!
definitely hit me when i had full control over my own budget – bills aren't fun though lol
definitely feel that - depth over spark now
markets crash - good thing solid love's more like investing long-term
naturescapes & tight communities shape ya big time 👍🏻
totally agree – those early vibes shape your whole approach to life
totally see that connection too - early exposure to all sorts of hustle definitely molds the work grind mindset here
